feed.title: Node-RED Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Node-RED: 4.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve the node name auto-generated with the first available number by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4912
  • Fix trigger node date handling for latest time type input by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4915
  • Fix envVar editable list should be sortable by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4932
  • Apply envVarExcludes setting to util.getSetting into the function node by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4925
  • Missing getSubscriptions in the docs while its implemented by @ersinpw in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4934
  • Fix setModulePendingUpdated with plugins by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4939
  • Remove disabled node types from QuickAddDialog list by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4946
  • Make delay node rate limit reset consistent - not send on reset. by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4940
  • Change groups.length to groups.size by @hungtcs in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4959
  • Get the env config node from the parent subflow by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4960
  • Rename variable to avoid confusion in view.js by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4963
  • Fix updating the Subflow name during a copy by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4809
  • Handle the import of an incomplete Subflow by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4811
  • Add config node to RED.history and handle changed prop by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4797
  • Fix save and history of credentials for panes by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4793
  • Fix a node with an invalid number of outputs by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4808
  • Fix the config node users count by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4807
  • Validate user nodes into history when editing a config node by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4819
  • Handle subflow node as user of config nodes by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4947
  • Performance : make reading single buffer / string file faster by not re-allocating and handling huge buffers by @Fadoli in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4980
  • Apply zoom scale when calculating annotation positions by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4981
  • Fix junction insert position via context menu by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4974
  • Validate json dropped into editor to avoid unhelpful error messages by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4964
  • Fix delay node not dropping when nodeMessageBufferMaxLength is set by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4973
  • Update dependencies by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4987
  • Rework saving of credentials to undo history by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4983
  • Ensure node.sep is honoured when generating CSV by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4982
  • Add qoutes when installing local tgz to fix spacing in the file path by @AGhorab-upland in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4949
  • Roll up various fixes on config node change history by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4975
  • Update for 4.0.6 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4990

New Contributors

  • @ersinpw made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4934
  • @hungtcs made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4959
  • @AGhorab-upland made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4949

Full Changelog: https://github.com/node-red/node-red/compare/4.0.5...4.0.6

entry.title: New release for Node-RED: 4.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support custom login message and button by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4993
  • Fix the user list of nested config node by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4995
  • Fix def can be undefined if the type is missing by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4997
  • Bump for 4.0.7 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4998

Full Changelog: https://github.com/node-red/node-red/compare/4.0.6...4.0.7

entry.title: New release for Node-RED: 4.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix config node sort order when importing by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5000
  • Bump for 4.0.8 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5001

Full Changelog: https://github.com/node-red/node-red/compare/4.0.7...4.0.8

entry.title: New release for Node-RED: 4.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix typo in CHANGELOG (4.0.7-->4.0.8) by @natcl in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5007
  • Fix grunt dev via better ndoemon ignore rules by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5015
  • Avoid exceeding call stack when draining message group in Switch by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5014
  • Fix library icon handling within library browser component by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5017
  • fix debug status reporting if null by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5018
  • Allow env var access to context by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5016
  • Do not select group when triggering quick-add within it by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5022
  • Update sf instance env vars when removed from template by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5023
  • Remember context sidebar tree state when refreshing by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5021
  • Handle dragging node into group and splicing link at same time by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5027
  • Handle undefined username when generating user icon by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5043
  • Handle long auto-complete suggests by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5042
  • feat: Add custom label for default deploy button in settings.editorTheme by @matiseni51 in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5030
  • Show subflow flow context under node section of sidebar by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5025
  • Prevent symbol usage warning in monaco by @Steve-Mcl in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5049
  • Fix tooltip snapping based on typedInput type by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5051
  • Add details for the dynamic subscription to match the English docs by @aikitori in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5050
  • Update for 4.0.9 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5052

New Contributors

  • @matiseni51 made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5030
  • @aikitori made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5050

Full Changelog: https://github.com/node-red/node-red/compare/4.0.8...4.0.9

entry.title: New release for Node-RED: 4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dev by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4836
  • fix(html): correct buggy html by @Rotzbua in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4768
  • Add a queue while installing or removing a module from the Palette Manager by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4937
  • Monaco Latest (0.52.0) by @Steve-Mcl in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4930
  • Add a new update available widget to statusBar by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4948
  • Fix import of module list by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4941
  • Add the vertical marker to the palette hand by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4954
  • Cleanup global Palette Manager variables by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4958
  • Trigger button action of the selected nodes with new Hotkey by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4924
  • fix: set label in themeSettings.deployButton despite type attribute by @matiseni51 in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5053
  • Ignore state of disabled nodes/flows during deployment by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5054
  • Support text drag & drop into markdown editor by @gorenje in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5056
  • Add the changed badge to the config node by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5062
  • Add .editorconfig to .gitignore by @gorenje in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5060
  • chore(editor)!: remove Internet Explorer polyfill by @Rotzbua in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5070
  • Support for disabled categories in Sidebar Config by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5061
  • Update markdown drop-target appearance by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5059
  • Add support for node: prefixed modules in function node by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5067
  • Handle deleting of subflow context entries by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5071
  • Refresh config node sidebar when changing lock state of a flow by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5072
  • chore(editor): update DOMPurify flag by @Rotzbua in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5073
  • Fix undo of subflow color change not applying to instances by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5012
  • Add a border to better distinguish typedInput type/option dropdowns by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5078
  • Improve debug display of error objects by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5079
  • Add code to error object sent by Catch node by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5081
  • Properly handle scale factor in getLinksAtPoint for firefox by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5087
  • Bump i18next to 24.x and auto-migrate message catalog format by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5088
  • Fix Sass deprecation warnings by @bonanitech in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4922
  • Update the Node-RED logo to use the hex variant by @joepavitt in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5103
  • Update dependencies by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5107
  • Colourise the Node-RED logs by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5109
  • Fix the capitisation for ALPN settings in http-request by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5105
  • Updates monaco to 0.52.0 for action widget sizing fix by @Steve-Mcl in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5110
  • Handle link nodes with show/hide label action by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5106
  • Default Palette Search: Sort by Downloads by @joepavitt in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5108
  • Add a node annotation if the info property is set by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4955
  • Include module list in global-config node when importing/exporting flows by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4599
  • Support for a module with nodes and plugins in the palette by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4945
  • Fix node tab filtering by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5119
  • Truncate long messages from the Debug Sidebar by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4944
  • Update dompurify by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5120
  • Only apply colours for non-default log lines by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5129
  • httprequest: Recommend HTTPS over HTTP by @ZJvandeWeg in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5141
  • Remove Internet Explorer CSS hacks by @bonanitech in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5142
  • Add an additional git_auth_failed condition by @sonnyp in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5145
  • Upgrade multer to 2.0.0 by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5148
  • Show deprecated message if module flagged by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5134
  • Add update notification by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5117
  • Rename Split The field by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5130
  • feat: import default export if plugin is a transpiled es module by @dschmidt in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5137
  • Bump Multer to 2.0.1 by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5151
  • Add node suggestion api to editor and apply to typeSearch by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5135
  • Import got module only once when sending metrics by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5152
  • Exclude internal properties from node definition by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5144
  • Add Install all button to the module list feature by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5123
  • Node filter support for typedInput's builtin node by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5154
  • Let split node send original msg to complete node by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5113
  • Add link icon to node docs and warn for major update by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5143
  • Add globalFunctionTimeout by @vasuvanka in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4985
  • Fix complete node to not feedback immediately connected nodes by @dceejay in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5114
  • Ensure generated mqtt clientId uses only valid chars by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5156
  • Exec: Make encoding handling consistent between stdout and err by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5158
  • Add URL/URLSearchParams to Function sandbox by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5159
  • Fix typo in de/httprequest.html by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5160
  • Add French translation for 4.1 by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5164
  • Include URL query params in HTTP Digest by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5166
  • Add French translation for 4.1 Welcome tour by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5165
  • Initial prep for 4.1.0-beta.1 release by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5163
  • Fix pending_version not set after module update by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5169
  • Allow limited Strings for msg.rejectUnauthorized by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5172
  • Do not use css display when counting filtered palette nodes by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5178
  • Update Japanese translations of mqtt nodes for 4.0.9 by @kazuhitoyokoi in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5174
  • Add Japanese translations for 4.1.0-beta.1 by @kazuhitoyokoi in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5173
  • Prevent library leaking full local paths by @hardillb in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5186
  • Add event-log widget to status bar by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5181
  • Prevent the editor to open the same dialog multiple times by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5170
  • feat: Add an option to the HTTP In to include the raw body. by @debadutta98 in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5037
  • Mermaid diagram fix for rendering diagrams inside Node-RED by @gorenje in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5167
  • Fixes infotip handling of cursor keys and updates english tip by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5187
  • Follow-up tweaks to HTTP In skip body parser by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5188
  • Swap manage/install-all buttons in dependency notification by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5189
  • Truncate topic of debug message and add tooltip by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5168
  • feat: tray's primary button function will no longer run when clicking anywhere in #red-ui-editor-shade by @AllanOricil in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5122
  • Hide event log status widget by default by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5191
  • Update jquery by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5192
  • setSuggestedFlow api improvements by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5180
  • Do not update suggestion whilst typeSearch hiding by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5193
  • Add support for plugin sources of autoComplete fields by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5194
  • Add splice property to nodes:add event context by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5195
  • Bump for 4.1.0-beta.2 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5196
  • Do not select a nearest node if move is active by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5199
  • Fix inject node validation to support binary and hexadecimal numbers by @ZJvandeWeg in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5212
  • Add Japanese translations for 4.1.0-beta.2 by @kazuhitoyokoi in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5209
  • Update French translation for 4.1 by @GogoVega in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5206
  • Update help document of filter node by @kazuhitoyokoi in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5210
  • Add got to runtime package by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5216
  • Support multiple suggestions at once by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5215
  • Updates for Node 24 by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5207
  • Better Monaco esc key bubbling by @Steve-Mcl in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5202
  • Support cjs files by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5221
  • Add splice history events to original add event by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5223
  • Bump dependencies by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5224
  • Fix: multipart form data upload issue by @debadutta98 in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5228
  • Bump node-red-admin to latest by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5232
  • Merge dev branch to master ahead of 4.1 release by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5222
  • Update for 4.1.0 release by @knolleary in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5233

New Contributors

  • @sonnyp made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5145
  • @vasuvanka made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/4985
  • @debadutta98 made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5037
  • @AllanOricil made their first contribution in https://github.com/node-red/node-red/pull/5122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/node-red/node-red/compare/4.0.9...4.1.0
